title: Title
main_page_text: The main page allows the user to enter a five-character input code to view the ballot question. The question can also be viewed by retrieving the published QR code or by entering the browser address in the form http://node17.webte.fei.stuba.sk:5151/abcde, where abcde represents the five character entry code. The voting question can be answered by selecting an answer from the menu or by typing the answer in the space provided. Also, if the user has not yet created a user account, they can register on the site using the "Register" button, which will redirect them to the registration page.
registration_page_text: An unregistered user registers on the site by filling in and submitting the registration form using the "Register" button. The user will then be sent a confirmation email with an activation link to be clicked within the next 24 hours.
instructions_for_logged_in_user_text: After registration, the user logs in to the site using the "Login" button, which redirects them to a login form page where they need to enter the user's login details, i.e. email and password, and submit the form using the "Login" button at the end of the form. In the case of a forgotten password, the user clicks on the "Forgot Password" button and after entering the email address used for registration, the user receives an email with a link to change the password, this link is only valid for the next 10 minutes. After a successful login, the user is redirected to the user's homepage.
user_home_page_text: On the home page, the user can create a new question with either an open-ended answer or a choice of the correct answer. He defines whether the question is active and selects the subject from the existing categories. If the desired subject does not yet exist the user has the option to define a new subject using the "Add subject" button. All existing questions are in a table that the user can filter by subject or creation date and also edit, delete or copy already defined questions. For each question, the user can generate a QR code and a unique five character code to display the question and close the current poll for that question. Likewise, the user can view the results of current and archived votes and, for multiple choice questions, view a comparison of the current vote with the historical vote. Finally, the user can export the questions and answers to an external file using the "Export" button. The home page in the top right corner contains a "Profile" button which redirects the user to the profile page.
profile_page_text: The profile page contains details about the logged in user such as permission level, email address and the last activity of the user. Using the "Change Password" button, the user is allowed to change the password.
instructions_for_administrator_text: An administrator can perform the same operations as a logged in user, except that they have the queries of all logged in users available on the user home page with the ability to filter over a selected user. When creating a new question, the administrator has the option to create a question on his or her own behalf, as well as on behalf of another user. In addition, the administrator has access to a table page of all logged in users where they can add new users, edit existing users, change their roles or reset their passwords, and delete users.
